public ref class DataControlField abstract : System::Web::UI::IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type DataControlField = class interface IStateManager interface IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor

summary.span: 用作所有数据控件字段类型的基类，这些类型表示表格格式的数据绑定控件（例如 和 ）中的数据列。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all data control field types, which represent a column of data in tabular data-bound controls such as and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用作所有数据控件字段类型的基类。The class serves as the base class for all data control field types. 数据绑定控件使用数据控件字段来表示数据字段，类似于 对象如何表示 控件中的列类型。Data control fields are used by data-bound controls to represent a field of data, similar to how a object represents a type of column in the control. 使用派生自 的类控制数据字段在数据绑定控件（如 或 ）中的显示方式。Use the classes that are derived from to control how a field of data is displayed in a data-bound control such as or . 下表列出了由 ASP.NET 提供的不同数据控件字段类型。The following table lists the different data control field types provided by ASP.NET. |列字段类型Column field type|说明Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||以文本形式显示数据源中字段的值。Displays the value of a field in a data source as text.| ||在数据绑定控件中显示命令按钮。Displays a command button in a data-bound control. 这允许您显示具有自定义按钮控件的行或列，如 "添加" 或 "删除" 按钮，具体取决于控件。Depending on the control, this allows you to display either a row or a column with a custom button control, such as an Add or a Remove button.| ||在数据绑定控件中显示复选框。Displays a check box in a data-bound control. 此数据控件字段类型通常用于显示具有布尔值的字段。This data control field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| ||显示内置命令按钮，用于在数据绑定控件中执行编辑、插入或删除操作。Displays built-in command buttons to perform edit, insert, or delete operations in a data-bound control.| ||将数据源中的字段值显示为超链接。Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink. 使用此数据控件字段类型，可以将第二个字段绑定到超链接的 URL。This data control field type allows you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| ||显示数据绑定控件中的图像。Displays an image in a data-bound control.| ||根据指定的模板在数据绑定控件中显示用户定义的内容。Displays user-defined content in a data-bound control according to a specified template.| 还可以扩展 和 类，以创建自己的数据控件字段类型。You can also extend the and classes to create your own data control field types. 类提供许多属性，这些属性确定用户界面（UI）元素在数据绑定控件中的显示方式。The class provides many properties that determine how user interface (UI) elements are presented in the data-bound control. 在呈现 UI 时，并非每个控件都使用每个可用的数据控件字段属性。Not every control uses every available data control field property when rendering a UI. 例如， 控件（将数据控件字段显示为行）包含每个数据控件字段的标题项，但没有脚注项。For example, the control, which displays the data control fields as rows, includes a header item for each data control field, but no footer item. 因此， 控件将忽略 和 属性。Therefore, the and properties are ignored by the control. 但是，如果 属性设置为 `true`，则 控件将使用 和 属性。The control, however, uses the and properties if the property is set to `true`. 同样，数据控件字段属性会影响 UI 元素的显示，具体取决于元素的内容。Similarly, the data control field properties affect the presentation of UI elements depending on what the element is. 属性始终应用于该字段。The property is always applied to the field. 如果从 派生的类型包含一个控件，如 或 类中所示， 属性将应用于该字段。If the type derived from contains a control, as in the or classes, the property is applied to the field. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用从 派生的 和 对象来显示 控件中的行。The following code example demonstrates how to use and objects, which are derived from , to display rows in a control. 控件的 属性设置为 `false`，这使它能够显示 属性返回的数据的子集。The control has the property set to `false`, which enables it to display a subset of the data returned by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1/CS/datacontrolfield1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1/VB/datacontrolfield1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展 类，以创建可在 控件中使用的自定义绑定字段。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class to create a custom bound field that can be used in a control. 与 类类似，`RadioButtonField` 类表示 `true` 或 `false` 数据的列。Similar to the class, the `RadioButtonField` class represents a column of `true` or `false` data. 但是，尽管 类绑定到的数据可以是任何一组 `true` 或 `false` 值，但 `RadioButtonField` 类绑定到的数据集在任何给定时间都只能有一个 `true` 值。However, although the data that the class is bound to can be any set of `true` or `false` values, the set of data that the `RadioButtonField` class is bound to can have only one `true` value at any given time. 此示例演示如何实现 和 方法，以及从 派生的所有类的两个重要方法。This example demonstrates how to implement the and methods, two important methods of all classes derived from . [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/CS/radiobuttonfield.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/VB/radiobuttonfield.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件中前面的示例中提供的 `RadioButtonField` 类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `RadioButtonField` class, which is provided in the previous example, in a control. 在此示例中， 控件显示运动团队的数据。In this example, the control displays data for a sports team. 在包含 ID 列、玩家姓名列以及标识团队 captain 的 true 或 false 列的数据表中维护播放机数据。The player data is maintained in a data table that includes an ID column, columns for the player names, and a true or false column that identifies the captain of the team. `RadioButtonField` 类用于显示当前团队 captain 的团队成员。The `RadioButtonField` class is used to display which team member is the current team captain. 可以编辑 控件以选择新的团队 captain 或更改其他播放机信息。The control can be edited to choose a new team captain or to change other player information. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_4/CS/datacontrolfield4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_4/VB/datacontrolfield4vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置 属性时，将调用 方法来引发状态更改事件。The method is called to raise a state change event when the property is set. 属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取 对象所包含的任何 Web 服务器控件的样式。

span.span: Gets the style of any Web server controls contained by the object.

value.span: 一个 ，控制字段所包含的 Web 服务器控件的外观。

span.span: A that governs the appearance of Web server controls contained by the field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控制派生自 的类型所包含的任何 Web 服务器控件的外观。The property governs the appearance of any Web server controls contained by types derived from . 此属性不会影响所有派生的类型。This property does not affect all derived types. 控件通常只显示文本数据并且仅包含 控件，在处于 状态时，仅受 属性的影响。The control, which typically displays text data and contains only controls, is only affected by the property when in state. Web 服务器控件（如 和 ）可能会受到 属性的影响，具体取决于字段包含的控件对象实例的特定配置。Web server controls such as and might be affected by the property, depending on the specific configuration of the control object instances contained by the field. 例如， 控件可以呈现为 、或 对象。For example, the control can be rendered as a , , or object. 尽管 控件受指定 对象的 `font` 属性的影响，但 控件不受影响。Although a control is affected by `font` attributes of the specified object, a control is not. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用从 派生的 和 对象来显示 控件中的行。The following code example demonstrates how to use and objects, which are derived from , to display rows in a control. 设置 对象的 属性，并控制如何显示字段所包含的 控件。The property of the object is set and governs how the control contained by the field is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2/CS/datacontrolfield2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2/VB/datacontrolfield2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 从当前表格单元格中提取数据控件字段的值，并将该值添加到指定的 集合中。

span.span: Extracts the value of the data control field from the current table cell and adds the value to the specified collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由从 派生的类型实现，以将当前字段与值关联（如果适用）。The method is implemented by types derived from to associate the current field with a value, if applicable. 字段/值对存储在传递给方法的 `dictionary` 集合中。The field/value pair is stored in the `dictionary` collection that is passed to the method. 方法由数据控件的 `ExtractRowValues` 方法调用，如 和 。The method is called by the `ExtractRowValues` method of data controls such as and . 在编写使用 对象组合一组单元及其关联值的自定义数据绑定控件时，请调用此方法。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to assemble a set of cells and their associated values. 在从显示用户数据或数据绑定数据的 中写入派生的类时，实现此方法。Implement this method when you are writing a class derived from that displays user data or data-bound data. 并非所有派生类型都实现 方法，因为并非所有字段都显示用户数据。Not all derived types implement the method, because not all fields display user data. 例如， 控件将显示一个按钮，并且不包含用户数据。For example, the control displays a button and has no user data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现派生自 类的控件的 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method for a control that derives from the class. `RadioButtonField` 类呈现 控件中每一行的数据绑定单选按钮。The `RadioButtonField` class renders a data-bound radio button for every row in a control. 调用 方法时，该方法将尝试确定是否选择或清除了单元中包含的 对象的当前值，并将该值添加到 集合。When the method is called, the method attempts to determine whether the current value of the object contained in the cell is selected or cleared, and adds the value to the collection. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/CS/radiobuttonfield.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/VB/radiobuttonfield.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置数据控件字段脚注的样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the footer of the data control field.

value.span: 一个 ，控制 的脚注项外观。

span.span: A that governs the appearance of the footer item of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控制从 派生的类型的脚注项中显示的任何文本的外观。The property governs the appearance of any text displayed in the footer item of a type derived from . > [!NOTE] > 某些数据绑定控件不呈现数据控件字段的脚注项。Some data-bound controls do not render a footer item for a data control field. 例如， 控件将其数据控件字段显示为行。For example, the control displays its data control fields as rows. 不会为这些数据控件字段呈现脚注项。A footer item is not rendered for these data control fields. 在这些控件中将忽略 属性。The property is ignored in these controls.

summary.span: 获取或设置数据控件字段的脚注项中显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the footer item of a data control field.

value.span: 一个在 的脚注项中显示的字符串。

span.span: A string that is displayed in the footer item of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 "" 属性可将注释或注释添加到数据控件字段，或添加到与字段相关的其他数据。Use the property to add notes or comments to a data control field, or for other data related to the field. > [!NOTE] > 某些数据绑定控件不呈现数据控件字段的脚注项。Some data-bound controls do not render a footer item for a data control field. 例如， 控件将其数据控件字段显示为行。For example, the control displays its data control fields as rows. 不会为这些数据控件字段呈现脚注项。A footer item is not rendered for these data control fields. 在这些控件中将忽略 属性。The property is ignored in these controls. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置数据控件字段的标题项中显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of an image that is displayed in the header item of a data control field.

value.span: 一个表示图像的完全限定或相对 URL 的字符串，该图像在 的标题项中显示。

span.span: A string that represents a fully qualified or relative URL to an image that is displayed in the header item of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望在数据控件的标题项中显示图像而不是标题文本，请设置 属性。Set the property when you want an image displayed in the header item of a data control instead of header text. > [!NOTE] > 如果同时设置了 "" 和 "" 属性， 属性优先。If both the and properties are set, the property has precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式设置 列的 属性，该属性在 控件的列标题而不是标题文本中显示图像。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property of a column, which displays an image in the control's column header instead of header text. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3/CS/datacontrolfield3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3/VB/datacontrolfield3vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置数据控件字段标头的样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the header of the data control field.

value.span: 一个控制 标题项外观的 。

span.span: A that governs the appearance of the header item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控制从 派生的类型的标题项中显示的任何文本的外观。The property governs the appearance of any text displayed in the header item of a type derived from . 属性最常见的应用是更改 控件中的列标题的样式。The most common application of the property is to alter the style of the column headers in a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式设置 列的 属性，该属性显示 控件中的列标题的黄色背景色。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property of a column, which displays a yellow background color for the column header in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3/CS/datacontrolfield3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3/VB/datacontrolfield3vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置数据控件字段的标题项中显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the header item of a data control field.

value.span: 一个在 的标题项中显示的字符串。

span.span: A string that is displayed in the header item of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可在数据控件中使用友好名称标识字段。Use the property to identify a field in a data control with a friendly name. 属性最常见的应用是为 或 控件中的数据绑定字段提供有意义的列名称。The most common application of the property is to provide meaningful column names for data-bound fields in a or control. > [!NOTE] > 如果同时设置了 "" 和 "" 属性， 属性优先。If both the and properties are set, the property has precedence. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式将 列的 属性设置为在 控件的列标题中显示文本。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the properties of columns to display text in the column headers of a control. 此代码示例演示了一种主要细节方案，其中 控件用于显示数据的子集，而 控件用于显示更大的数据集和插入新记录。This code example demonstrates a master-details scenario in which a control is used to display a subset of data while the control is used to display a larger set of data and insert new records. 该示例使用两个 控件：一个用于填充 控件，另一个用于填充 控件和插入数据。The example uses two controls: one to populate the control and one to populate the control and insert data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

The data control that owns the .

summary.span: 为数据控件字段执行基础实例初始化。

span.span: Performs basic instance initialization for a data control field.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 对象关联的控件调用 方法，以便在将字段添加到行集合之前对其进行初始化。The control that the object is associated with calls the method to initialize the field before it is added to a rows collection. 数据控件（如 和 ）在调用其他方法（如 `CreateRow`）之前调用其 `CreateChildControls` 方法中的 方法，以创建包含数据的特定行。Data controls such as and call the method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before calling other methods such as `CreateRow` to create specific rows with data. 在编写使用 对象对任何 对象执行基本初始化的自定义数据绑定控件时，请调用此方法。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to perform basic initialization for any objects. 如果你的派生类型在用 方法中的数据或控件填充 对象之前需要初始化对象，则实现此方法。Implement this method if your derived type requires any object initialization before it populates objects with data or controls in the method.

summary.span: 将文本或控件添加到单元格的控件集合中。

span.span: Adds text or controls to a cell's controls collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自 的类型实现 方法，以将文本和控件添加到属于使用表显示用户界面（UI）的数据控件的 对象。Types derived from implement the method to add text and controls to a object that belongs to a data control that uses tables to display a user interface (UI). 当调用各自的 `CreateChildControls` 方法时，这些数据控件会按行创建完整的表结构。These data controls create the complete table structure row by row when their respective `CreateChildControls` methods are called. 方法由数据控件的 `InitializeRow` 方法调用，如 和 。The method is called by the `InitializeRow` method of data controls such as and . 在编写使用 对象的自定义数据绑定控件时，请调用此方法，以便使用数据或控件初始化表结构的单元格。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to initialize the cells of the table structure with data or controls. 在编写从 派生的类时，实现此方法。Implement this method when you are writing a class derived from . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现派生自 类的控件的 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method for a control that derives from the class. `RadioButtonField` 类呈现 控件中每一行的数据绑定单选按钮。The `RadioButtonField` class renders a data-bound radio button for every row in a control. 当行向用户显示数据并且未处于编辑模式时，将禁用 控件。When the row is displaying data to a user and is not in edit mode, the control is disabled. 如果行处于编辑模式，例如当用户选择更新 控件中的行时， 控件将呈现为 "已启用"，以便可以单击它。When the row is in edit mode, for example when the user chooses to update a row in the control, the control is rendered as enabled so that it can be clicked. 此示例使用按位 "与" 运算符，因为行状态可能是一个或多个 值的组合。This example uses bitwise AND operators, because the row state might be a combination of one or more values. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/CS/radiobuttonfield.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/VB/radiobuttonfield.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 当前显示行的状态时，数据绑定控件处于插入模式下。A data-bound control is in insert mode when the state of the current display row is . 在呈现一组字段之前， 控件将检查此属性的值。The control checks the value of this property before it renders a set of fields. 如果 `false` 属性，则 对象的 属性设置为 `false`。If the property is `false`, the property of the object is set to `false`. 属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state.

span.span: Gets the style of any text-based content displayed by a data control field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控制由派生自 的类型显示的任何文本数据的外观。The property governs the appearance of any text data displayed by a type derived from . 例如，将 控件绑定到文本数据时，可以使用 属性来更改显示的文本的外观。For example, when you bind a control to text data, you can use the property to alter the appearance of the text that is displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式设置用于在 控件中显示 `FirstName` 和 `LastName` 数据的 对象的 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property on the objects used to display `FirstName` and `LastName` data in a control. 控件的 属性设置为 `false`，这使它能够显示 属性返回的数据的子集。The control has the property set to `false`, which enables it to display a subset of the data returned by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1/CS/datacontrolfield1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1/VB/datacontrolfield1vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将数据源视图还原为保存过的前一视图状态。

span.span: Restores the data source view's previously saved view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). 此方法从 方法保存的上一个页面请求还原 对象的视图状态信息。This method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnFieldChanged ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnFieldChanged() cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnFieldChanged ()
protected: virtual void OnFieldChanged();
abstract member OnFieldChanged : unit -> unit override this.OnFieldChanged : unit -> unit

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发事件，该事件指示 对象的状态已更改。The method raises an event signaling that the object's state has changed. 对以下属性的更改导致引发此事件： 、、、、和 。Changes to the following properties cause this event to be raised: , , , , , and . 当状态发生更改时，派生类型属性也会引发此事件。Derived type properties also raise this event when state changes occur. Web 服务器控件（例如 和 ）通常会调用 `DataBind` 方法来响应字段更改事件。Web server controls such as and typically call the `DataBind` method in response to a field change event. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual object SaveViewState ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function SaveViewState () As Object
protected: virtual System::Object ^ SaveViewState();
abstract member SaveViewState : unit -> obj override this.SaveViewState : unit -> obj

summary.span: 保存在页回发到服务器后对 视图状态所做的更改。

span.span: Saves the changes made to the view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 视图状态更改的对象。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与此对象关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the object, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 视图状态是服务器控件属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动置于服务器控件的 属性中，该属性是 类的实例。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 然后，将此属性的值保存到服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后的字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 保存视图状态时，字符串将作为存储在 HTML `hidden` 元素中的变量返回给客户端。When view state is saved, a string is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `hidden` element. 创作自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写此方法并修改服务器控件的 属性来提高效率。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 视图状态概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386448(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386448(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 使 对象跟踪对其视图状态所做的更改，以便这些更改可以存储在控件的 属性中并且能够在同一页的不同请求间得以保持。

span.span: Causes the object to track changes to its view state so they can be stored in the control's property and persisted across requests for the same page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置了属性，则实现此方法以返回 属性的值。This method is implemented to return the value of the property, if the property is set. 否则，此方法只返回表示数据控件字段类型的字符串（例如 "BoundField"）。Otherwise, this method simply returns a string that represents the type of the data control field (for example, "BoundField").

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，发出信号表示字段所包含的控件支持回调。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, signals that the controls contained by a field support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法，用于确定包含在 对象中的控件是否支持回调。The method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks. 已实现此方法的基实现，以引发 异常以指示不支持回调。The base implementation of this method has been implemented to throw a exception to indicate that callbacks are not supported. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

exception.span: 在 类的默认实例上调用此方法。

span.span: The method is called on a default instance of the class.

para.span: 从 类派生的类可以重写此方法，以指示字段包含的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指示支持回调，请将此方法实现为空方法，该方法不会引发异常;否则，将引发异常，并提供有用的消息，说明不支持回调的原因。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取状态信息的字典，这些信息使您可以在同一页的多个请求间保存和还原 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a object across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 一个 实例，包含 视图状态信息。

span.span: An instance of that contains the view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据控件字段的视图状态是其所有属性值的累计。A data control field's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 若要跨 HTTP 请求保留这些值，ASP.NET 服务器控件使用此属性（ 类的实例）来存储属性值。To preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET server controls use this property, which is an instance of the class, to store the property values. 然后，在处理后续请求时，这些值将作为变量传递给 HTML 隐藏输入元素。The values are then passed as a variable to an HTML hidden input element when subsequent requests are processed. 有关保存服务器控件视图状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 视图状态概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386448(v=vs.100))。For more information about saving server control view state, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386448(v=vs.100)). 默认情况下，为所有服务器控件启用了视图状态，但在某些情况下，您将需要禁用该状态。View state is enabled for all server controls by default, but there are circumstances when you will want to disable it. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 性能概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668225(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668225(v=vs.100)). 有关字典以及如何使用它们的详细信息，请参阅[集合和数据结构](/dotnet/standard/collections/)。For more information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](/dotnet/standard/collections/).

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否呈现数据控件字段的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a data control field is rendered.

value.span: 如果呈现 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is rendered; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可显示或隐藏数据绑定控件中 的对象。Use the property to show or hide objects in a data-bound control. 如果 `false` 属性，则不会显示数据值，也不会向客户端进行往返。If the property is `false`, the data values are not displayed and do not make a round-trip to the client. 如果要为不可见的字段往返数据，请将字段名称添加到数据绑定控件的 `DataKeyNames` 属性。If you want to round-trip the data for a field that is not visible, add the field name to the `DataKeyNames` property of the data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用从 派生的 和 对象来显示 控件中的行。The following code example demonstrates how to use and objects, which are derived from , to display rows in a control. 显示 `EmployeeID` 列的 对象的 属性设置为 `false`，并且 控件不呈现列。The property of the object that displays the `EmployeeID` column is set to `false`, and the column is not rendered by the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2/CS/datacontrolfield2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2/VB/datacontrolfield2vb.aspx#1)]
